game.name: Runaway, A Road Adventure
game.shortDescription: New York, 2000......Without knowing how or why, Brian, a student on the verge of graduating from college, is attacked by Mafia gangsters. During his desperate getaway, in the company of a mysterious striptease dancer, he ends up meeting a wide range of unusual characters.

reviewHighlights.text: Fun little Lucasarts style adventure. Took a little bit of investigating to get it to run properly. It would be nice if the game install was packaged...
